QueryViewSpec.Name: Child Project Disbursement With Not Funded Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: This is used to get the sponsored / unsponsored registered children counts and counts for children unfunded due to Child Annual Update interactions
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
with RegisteredChildren (FIELDOFFICEID, PROJECTLOOKUPID, SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS) as ( select FIELDOFFICEID, dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_GETLOOKUPID (FIELDOFFICEID) as PROJECTLOOKUPID, so.ID SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, --case -- when dbo.UFN_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY_ACTIVESPONSORSHIPS(so.ID) > 0 then 'Sponsored' -- when AVAILABILITYCODE = 1 then 'Unsponsored - Reserved' -- else 'Unsponsored' --end as SPONSORSHIPSTATUS, --coalesce (dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCURRENTSTATUSFROMSPONSORSHIPEXTENSION (so.ID),'') as CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS1, coalesce(ct.[DESCRIPTION],'') as CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on slocation.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID inner join dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTEXTENSION cp_ext on cp_ext.ID = slocation.FIELDOFFICEID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so.ID = so_child.ID left join dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION ch_ext on so.ID = ch_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID left join dbo.usr_sponsorshipextension s_ext on s_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and s_ext.ISCURRENT = 1 left join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE ct on ct.ID = s_ext.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID
where (cp_ext.UNSPONSOREDFUND = 0 or (cp_ext.UNSPONSOREDFUND = 1 and s_ext.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID is not null) ) /* or (slocation.STATUSCODE = 1 -- Inactive and slocation.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = '3EC2BD25-FEC7-41B9-8C4F-DDA63C063DEC') -- phasing out ) */ and ch_ext.Funded=1 and so.ELIGIBILITYCODE in (0,1) -- @eligibilityCodePending, @eligibilityCodeEligible) ),
NotFundedRegisteredChildren (FIELDOFFICEID, PROJECTLOOKUPID, SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS) as ( select FIELDOFFICEID, dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_GETLOOKUPID (FIELDOFFICEID) as PROJECTLOOKUPID, so.ID SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, --case -- when dbo.UFN_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY_ACTIVESPONSORSHIPS(so.ID) > 0 then 'Sponsored' -- when AVAILABILITYCODE = 1 then 'Unsponsored - Reserved' -- else 'Unsponsored' --end as SPONSORSHIPSTATUS, --coalesce (dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCURRENTSTATUSFROMSPONSORSHIPEXTENSION (so.ID),'') as CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS1, coalesce(ct.[DESCRIPTION],'') as CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on slocation.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID inner join dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTEXTENSION cp_ext on cp_ext.ID = slocation.FIELDOFFICEID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so.ID = so_child.ID left join dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION ch_ext on so.ID = ch_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID left join dbo.usr_sponsorshipextension s_ext on s_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and s_ext.ISCURRENT = 1 left join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE ct on ct.ID = s_ext.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID
where (cp_ext.UNSPONSOREDFUND = 0 or (cp_ext.UNSPONSOREDFUND = 1 and s_ext.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID is not null) ) /* or (slocation.STATUSCODE = 1 -- Inactive and slocation.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = '3EC2BD25-FEC7-41B9-8C4F-DDA63C063DEC') -- phasing out ) */ and ch_ext.Funded=0 and so.ELIGIBILITYCODE in (0,1) -- @eligibilityCodePending, @eligibilityCodeEligible)
and (exists (select inter.ID from dbo.INTERACTION inter join dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY sub on inter.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID = sub.ID where so_child.CONSTITUENTID = inter.CONSTITUENTID and inter.STATUSCODE = 1 -- Pending and ( sub.ID = (select subcat.ID from dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY subcat inner join dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY cat on subcat.INTERACTIONCATEGORYID = cat.ID where lower (subcat.NAME) = lower ('Annual Photo Update') and lower (cat.NAME) = lower ('Child Annual Update')) or
sub.ID = (select subcat.ID from dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY subcat inner join dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY cat on subcat.INTERACTIONCATEGORYID = cat.ID where lower (subcat.NAME) = lower ('Annual Child Letter') and lower (cat.NAME) = lower ('Child Annual Update')) ) and cast(dateadd (d, 60, inter.EXPECTEDDATE) as DATE) <= cast (getdate() as date) ) ) ),
RegisteredChildrenTotals (FIELDOFFICEID, PROJECTLOOKUPID, SPONSOREDCOUNT, UNSPONSOREDCOUNT, TOTALCHILDCOUNT) as ( select FIELDOFFICEID, PROJECTLOOKUPID, sum(case when CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS='Sponsored' then 1 else 0 end) as SPONSOREDCOUNT, sum(case when CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS<>'Sponsored' and CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS is not null then 1 else 0 end) as UNSPONSOREDCOUNT, count(*) as TOTALCHILDCOUNT from RegisteredChildren group by FIELDOFFICEID, PROJECTLOOKUPID ),
NotFundedRegisteredChildrenTotals (FIELDOFFICEID, PROJECTLOOKUPID, SPONSOREDCOUNT, UNSPONSOREDCOUNT, TOTALCHILDCOUNT) as ( select FIELDOFFICEID, PROJECTLOOKUPID, sum(case when CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS='Sponsored' then 1 else 0 end) as SPONSOREDCOUNT, sum(case when CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS<>'Sponsored' and CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS is not null then 1 else 0 end) as UNSPONSOREDCOUNT, count(*) as TOTALCHILDCOUNT from NotFundedRegisteredChildren group by FIELDOFFICEID, PROJECTLOOKUPID ) select coalesce (rct.FIELDOFFICEID, nft.FIELDOFFICEID) as FIELDOFFICEID, coalesce (rct.PROJECTLOOKUPID, nft.PROJECTLOOKUPID) as PROJECTLOOKUPID, convert (varchar(10), GETDATE(), 1) as DATADATE, coalesce (rct.SPONSOREDCOUNT, 0) as SPONSOREDCOUNT, coalesce (rct.UNSPONSOREDCOUNT, 0) as UNSPONSOREDCOUNT, coalesce (rct.TOTALCHILDCOUNT, 0) as TOTALCHILDCOUNT, coalesce (nft.SPONSOREDCOUNT, 0) as UNFUNDEDSPONSOREDCOUNT, coalesce (nft.UNSPONSOREDCOUNT, 0) as UNFUNDEDUNSPONSOREDCOUNT, coalesce (nft.TOTALCHILDCOUNT, 0) as UNFUNDEDTOTALCHILDCOUNT from RegisteredChildrenTotals rct full outer join NotFundedRegisteredChildrenTotals nft on rct.FIELDOFFICEID = nft.FIELDOFFICEID
